name: Fun Technology Limited
tag_list: china-electronics, consumer-electronics, electronic-gadgets, electronic-gifts-and-premiums, camcorder, digital-camera, digital-media-player, digital-photo-frame, ebook-reader, tablet-pc, touch-phone, thumb-drive, gps-navigation
overview:
Fun Technology Limited is committed to providing global buyers with high-quality electronics like camcorders,digital cameras,digital media players,digital photo frames,ebook readers,tablet PCs and GPS navigation at the lowest possible prices.

At Fun, we believe true service starts after the product you ordered arrives at your doorstep. We folloelectronicw through on our commitment to excellence with exceptional customer service. Our passionate team of service associates are available via phone, e-mail and online chat to ensure your utmost satisfaction.

Our Primary Competitive Advantages: 1) Well and High Quality Control 2) Prompt Delivery 3) Earth-friendly Products 4) Customer’s Designs and Logos are Welcome 5) Competitive Prices 6) Fit for Gifts & Premiums 7) In a Variety of Design 8) Small Order Acceptable 9) ODM Accepted 10) OEM Accepted
